thread.title: Top beautiful Starbucks stores in Hanoi
thread.title_full: Top beautiful Starbucks stores in Hanoi

author: Nguyen Manh Dung-2015-09-21T03:26:33-0400
title: Top beautiful Starbucks stores in Hanoi
text:
21, 2015 
Starbucks coffee shops Hanoi are emerging as a phenomenon in the youth and those who love drinking coffee at great view. Let’s take a look at the following stores of Starbucks Hanoi to understand why they attract a lot of tasters 
Starbucks Hanoi coffee shops are captivating a large number of Hanoian and visitors who love the world-famous brand. They are coming there more and more not just to try the special tastes of coffee and other beverages, but also contemplate the bustling city view. At present, there are five Starbucks Hanoi shattering at five ideal locations in the capital city. They are Starbuck Coffee Press Club at 59 Ly Thai Tho Street, Starbucks Coffee Lan Vien at 32 Hang Bai Street, Starbucks Coffee Ba Trieu at 314 Ba Trieu Street, Starbucks Coffee at 27 Le Dai Hanh Street, and Starbucks Coffee IPH on Xuan Thuy Street. All of these stores are decorated simple but attractive almost guests. They also have great views of city and streets. Let’s take a small “tour” to these Starbucks stores in text and images with AloTrip , and do not forget to drop by when having a chance! 
Starbucks Coffee Lan Vien – 32 Hang Bai Street 
This is the first Starbucks coffee shop opened in Hanoi. It is located at 32 Hang Bai Street, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi – a central streets in this city, near many famous attractions in Hanoi . It has great view of Hang Bai Street with green trees and clean road in the harmony with bustling life. The coffee store of Starbucks is serving takeaway mainly with 30 coffee types. In addition, beverage menu here is quite diverse, especially Asia Dolce Latte which is favored by many Asian tasters. The interior and decoration of Starbucks Coffee Lan Vien are designed by artists in Hanoi, which features cultural identity of the city. 
Starbuck Coffee Press Club – 59 Ly Thai To Street 
Starbuck Coffee Press Club at 59 Ly Thai To Street (Trang Tien, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi) demonstrates more Starbucks deep commitment to the Vietnamese community. On reaching the coffee shop, guests will be attracted with an eye-catching outside decoration, and totally captivated by harmonic and cozy atmosphere inside. The coffee shop serves a wide range of coffee and tasty drinks. The Hanoi Starbucks store is opposite to Sofitel Legend Metropole Hotel Hanoi – one of the most beautiful and oldest hotels in Vietnam. At night, from the coffee store, coffee tasters can sip their drink and contemplate the shimmering beauty of the hotel, along with nice view of street and even wonderful view of Hanoi Opera House and Hanoi Hilton Hotel. 
Starbucks Coffee Ba Trieu – 314 Ba Trieu Street 
Starbucks Coffee Ba Trieu is situated at one of the best streets in Hanoi, opposite the most expensive shopping mall in the city – Vincom Center Hanoi. This is also one of the most beautiful coffee shops in Hanoi. Like other stores of Starbucks in Hanoi, Starbucks Coffee Ba Trieu has a variety of beverages and cakes. In addition, it has great interior and exterior design, creating a cozy and comfortable atmosphere. From the second floor, guests can enjoy the beautiful city view and the business of Vincom Center. This in an ideal place for chilling out with friends. 
Starbucks Coffee – 27 Le Dai Hanh Street 
Not far from Starbucks Coffee Ba Trieu, another Starbucks Coffee store is located at 27 Le Dai Hanh Street. Le Dai Hanh Street is a convergence of many coffee shops, but Starbucks Coffee still appeals a great number of coffee fans. The store has two floors with simple and cozy architectural design. Perhaps, the branch of Starbucks Hanoi has less beautiful view than other; yet, from the second floor, guests can enjoy spacious atmosphere of terrace with view of city’s bustle. It also attracts tasters by serving manners and decoration inside. 
Starbucks Coffee IPH – 241 Xuan Thuy Street 
Quite far from the city center compared to other Starbucks stores in Hanoi , Starbucks Coffee IPH lies at 241 Xuan Thuy Street, Cau Giay District. Located on the ground floor of Indochina Plaza Hanoi, Starbucks Coffee IPH is a cozy and ideal place for families and friends to share wonderful time toghether while sipping tasty drinks. Maybe, this is one of the largest Starbucks stores in Hanoi with wide and spacious terrace. From the terrace, guests can see the exciting city life and lines of workers and students who are in hurry. 
Despite newly opened in Hanoi, Starbucks Coffee in Hanoi is engaging many visitors and becomes interesting dating and meeting place of Hanoian, especially the youth to come and enjoy happy time toghether. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
